tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NetworkConfigurations (
  service_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  configuration JSON
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(50),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE service_locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(255)
);
